stories.headline: Mother: Father had zombie apocalypse plan
stories.articleHighlight: COEUR d'ALENE â€” Eldon Samuel III's father had prepared to load a camping trailer with numerous guns and other weapons, stocks of water and canned food, and take the family high into the mountains in the event of a zombie apocalypse.

stories.headline: N.M. man kills friend because he thought he was zombie: cops
stories.articleHighlight: A New Mexico man brutally killed his buddy after binge-watching "The Walking Dead" because he believed his friend had transformed into a zombie, he told cops.

stories.headline: These 'zombie' bees make the flight of the living dead
stories.articleHighlight: The bees in the above video aren't dead, but they're about as zombified as bees could be. They're suffering from just one of the many ailments putting honey bee colonies under pressure: a devastating parasite.

stories.headline: These parasitic wasps turn spiders into web-building zombies
stories.articleHighlight:
You do not want to mess with the Reclinervellus nielseni wasp. Especially if you're a spider.
These parasitic wasps deposit their eggs onto spiders, which, yuck. But it gets worse: the wasp larvae force spiders to build reinforced webs to keep them safe as they transition into adulthood. Once the webs are done, the larvae kills the spiders.
